mods.abstract: Black and white head-and-shoulders studio portrait of Steve Wariner. The photo was released by MCA Records Nashville. On the back of the photo, a handwritten note says, "3 L-R 3 1/2 TB," presumably in reference to the size of the metal photoplate made from the photo.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
